example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_1S انا)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG صَراحَة))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1S قُولت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1S انا)) (NP-ADV (NOUN كِدا) (NOUN كِدا)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ مَضرُوب))))) (S (NP-ADV (NOUN خَلاص)) (ADVP (ADV بَقَى)) (VP (IV1S+IV اَتْغابَى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه))))) (FRAG (CONJ وِ) (NP-ADV (NOUN زَيّ) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV تِيْجِي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *))))))))
